question:
December 11th 2019 marked 73 years since the formation of the UNICEF. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. UNICEF is headquartered in Copenhagen.
  2. It is a recipient of the Nobel Peace Prize.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: UNICEF or United Nations Children’s Fund is headquartered in New York, USA. It has several regional offices in Kathmandu, Dakar (Senegal), Amman (Jordan), Bangkok (Thailand), Nairobi (Kenya), Panama City (Panama) and Geneva (Switzerland). UNICEF was founded on December 11th 1946 the UN General Assembly. Statement 2 is correct: UNICEF is a recipient of the Nobel Peace Prize. It was awarded the prize in 1965 for ‘promoting the will of Alfred Nobel’ and for ‘promoting brotherhood among the nations’. It is noted for providing developmental and humanitarian assistance to children around the world.
